basics.name: Ramit Islam
basics.label: Alumni
basics.summary: I am a student in the B.S. program in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2020.

courses: Discreet Mathematics for CS I & II
Introduction to Computer Science I & II

work.company: STAR GPS at University of Hawaii, Manoa
work.summary: Assisted development team with website feature updates and university wordpress site builds and maintenance.
highlights: Helped build pop-up modules and other site enhancements for the UH STAR class registration and calendaring system, which resulted in student/advisor UI experience improvements; development utilized the AngularJS framework, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, GitBucket/GitKraken for source control, and Trello for project management.

Administered campus-wide WordPress website updates, technical support, and set framework for new department sites and databases, website buildout and maintenance training for department administrators.

work.summary: Managed social media, website, collateral design and fund development for the agency.
highlights: Leadership team: Coordinated and developed general office improvements and employee benefits. Strategized with Board of Directors on Fund Development, Public Awareness, and Anniversary Program Development committees.

Fund development: Procured, solicited, and managed donations and sponsorships. Developed and maintained sponsor database for fundraising campaigns, newsletter and other public outreach. Coordinated events such as anniversary gala dinners, golf tournaments, ARTafterDARK, Men’s March Against Violence, and other public awareness events.

Brand identity and management: Developed and oversaw agency rebranding campaign. Designed agency collateral, event programs, newsletters, website, and social media. Edited audio and video for various agency department.

Public awareness: Maintained, produced, and managed a monthly e-newsletter with 4000+ subscribers.Researched, developed and maintained agency website (www.stoptheviolence.org). Administrated agency social media outreach through Facebook and Instagram.
Managed 20th and 25th Anniversary year-long events, as well as all major fundraising events for agency.
Basic technology support and computer troubleshooting for agency.

work.summary: Manage promotions, marketing and project organization for clubs and specialized music/dance events.
highlights: Director of Music/Marketing – 5520 Ultralounge @ Princeville Resort, Lotus Soundbar Nightclub, The Living Room Nightclub, Eleven44 Nightclub.

Produced & performed at events for high end establishments such as Morimoto Waikiki, St. Regis Princeville, Nobu Waikiki, The Edition Hotel, The Modern Honolulu, Modern Luxury Magazine, Luxury Row, Salvatore Ferragamo, and Emporio Armani.
